original: assert (H2m: 2 * m = 2 + (2 * (m - 1))) by lia. rewrite H2m. clear H2m. rewrite Z.add_comm. rewrite Z2Zp_plus. rewrite Z.add_comm. rewrite Z2Zp_plus. rewrite Z.add_comm. rewrite Z2Zp_plus. reflexivity.
